content.question: Which of the following causes the air to rise high into the atmosphere in the areas labeled A, B, and C on the diagram?

choices.label: The rotation of Earth shifting the direction of the air upward
Warm, moist air that is less dense than the surrounding air

content.answer: Warm, moist air that is less dense than the surrounding air

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain relationships between different characteristics of environmental concepts, processes, or models represented visually. a. In theoretical contexts. b. In applied contexts.
